text: Michael Bilirakis (born July 16, 1930) is an American politician. He was a Republican member of the United States House of Representatives since 1983 until 2007, representing the 9th District of Florida. In August 2009, Bilirakis was added to Governor Charlie Crist's short list to Replace U.S. Senator Mel Martinez. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Michael Bilirakis
